name: Forex
description: I am travelling. I want to save in a foreign currency

products.name: Nedbank Travel Card
products.shortDescription: The Nedbank Travel Card offers you a safe, convenient and affordable way to access your money when you travel. It allows you to load up to 8 international currencies at locked-in exchange rates.
salesHighlights: Load up to 8 international currencies with locked-in exchange rate.
The card will automatically use the currency of the country where you are using the card.
We will arrange emergency cash for you should you lose both your cards.
No commission charged when you cash out your card on returning from your travels.
Reloadable and has a life span of 3 years.
Accepted globally at more than 34 million ATMs and merchant point-of-sale (POS) locations.
Remotely top-up your funds by emailing retailfx@nedbank.co.za with your request.
View your transactions on the Nedbank Money app

productFeatures.name: CardFee
productFeatures.description: Card fee - R150 once-off for three years (currently free until 31 Dec 2018 if you purchase a card)

productFeatures.name: ReplacementCard
productFeatures.description: Replacement card - R150 once-off for three years

products.name: Foreign Bank notes
products.shortDescription: Foreign banknotes are cash notes in the currency of the country you are visiting.
salesHighlights: Security - Depending on the currency type, foreign banknotes have unique security features such as watermarks, foil threading, braille markings, holographic images and microprint.
Speed - Foreign banknotes allow you to pay for goods and services immediately.
Convenience - They are ideal for smaller purchases and expenses such as a cup of coffee, taxi fares and tipping porters and hotel staff.

productFeatures.name: Commission
productFeatures.displayName: Commission (Banknotes for countries in Common Monetary Area)
productFeatures.description: Commission (Banknotes for countries in Common Monetary Area) -3.25%

products.name: Credit Card
products.shortDescription: We offer a wide range of credit cards in South Africa that offer you the convenience of shopping in store or online.
salesHighlights: Security - Depending on the currency type, foreign banknotes have unique security features such as watermarks, foil threading, braille markings, holographic images and microprint.
Speed - Foreign banknotes allow you to pay for goods and services immediately.
Convenience - They are ideal for smaller purchases and expenses such as a cup of coffee, taxi fares and tipping porters and hotel staff.

productFeatures.name: Commission
productFeatures.displayName: Commission (Banknotes for countries in Common Monetary Area)
productFeatures.description: Commission (Banknotes for countries in Common Monetary Area) -3.25%

products.name: Foreign Currency Account
products.shortDescription: A Foreign Currency Account allows you to invest funds in major foreign currencies, USD, GBP, EUR
salesHighlights: Affordable - You can invest a minimum opening balance of 100 USD, GBP or EUR
Peace of mind - You may protect your investment against currency fluctuations without having to move funds offshore
Cost-effective - There are no monthly maintenance fees
Convenience - You can transfer funds in a foreign currency to an account held at an overseas bank (subject to exchange control regulations)

productFeatures.name: MinimumCharge
productFeatures.description: There are no monthly maintenance fees.
